instructions:
Chop well-drained cabbage or other greens coarsely. Mix with mashed potatoes.
Combine in heavy saucepan and, over low heat, beat in milk, oil, butter, and salt and pepper, adjusting milk until consistency is lightly creamy. Add salt and pepper to taste.
Serve very hot, sprinkled with chives.
ingredients: 2 pounds plain or Savoy cabbage, cooked and drained
2 pounds boiling potatoes, cooked and mashed
1/2 cup skim milk, or as needed
title: Colcannon Champ
